title: Having lag issues, any ideas?
body:
So basically every game i go into, my ping doesn't drop below 70, i get 60 at best, if I'm lucky, and every few seconds i get lag spikes, usually to about 100 - 170 ping, which is in most cases, while sometimes i also get ping up to 15 000, and often I get  a "attempting to reconnect" window, these lags usually last for about 20 seconds, but if one occurs there will be many to follow, its very rare that i manage to play through a match without having any lag problems. 

Now, this has been going on for a while, and at first i thought my internet was bad or buggy, cause it knows to shut down sometimes for no reason (its about 10mbps), but then i tried playing on multiple different locations and connections,and its always the same.
Currently i am in another town with a more smooth connection (not buggy, doesn't turn off by itself, but its 5mbps). although it is wireless, but im about a meter from the router, and I'm having the same problem, only difference is, that the lag is more often but has less of a ping, doesn't go beyond 200.

The only reason i can think of why this is happening is because I'm playing on Europe West, but I'm from the Balkans, but still i don't get the constant random ping jumping and lag spikes, that can be huge. Also, beyond LoL, everything else works perfectly.

So if anyone has any idea if maybe i could fix this somehow, maybe some lol files are corrupted (but i think that causes fps problems, not lag) or something?

replies.body:
Corrupted files definitely won't impact your connection, but the fact that this happens across multiple connections and locales intrigues me. I suspect there may be network settings local to your PC that could be causing this. To ensure that's not the cause, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps changed anything.
